title: Cape Lookout National Seashore: Get Involved
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved           Get Involved       Experiencing Cape Lookout National Seashore is even more rewarding when you get involved and become a steward of these special barrier islands. There are many opportunities to contribute your time, skills and enthusiasm in support of the park. Check the following links for some ideas.  NPS Centennial:  The National Park Service is turning 100!  Find ways to join the celebration.  Partners: Partner organizations are an important part of the park.   Donate: Whether its by volunteering your time and talents, contributing an artifact to the museum collection or supporting a special project fund; there are many ways to donate to support the park.   Volunteer: Become a VIP (that's Volunteer in Park)!  There are many opportunities for singles, couples and groups to volunteer.   Work With Us:  Ever wanted to work at the park?  Here is information on the types of positions -- seasonal, internship, volunteer -- and how to apply for them.  Be sure to download the How to Use USAJobs guide. This guide will walk you through how to submit your resume on the federal USAJobs website. Do Business With Us: Learn how to go about becoming a commercial partner. Park Planning & Management: Looking for historic building information or sea turtle nesting success reports?  This is the place for them!  Here you will find links to historic resource studies, historic structure reports, annual wildlife reports as well as general management plans and other park management guidance. Support Your Park:  Its easy to support the park by doing some very simple things during your visit.  Check here for ideas on what you can do.
